Articles.Content: I've been watching the videos and I've seen the passion of the people putting KSP2 together. I appreciate the level of commitment and I think it will shine through in the game. I can't wait for 2/24!

I am so much looking forward to KSP 2. I have been with KSP from around v0.15. My two big wishes for KSP 2 are still oldschool, but important to me:

- Linux support

- "portable" installation methods and running without a launcher: I always had a couple of separate KSP directories with different mod-sets and KSP versions and would love to keep it that way with KSP 2.

 

Everything else looks good and from the team's enthusiasm I do believe you all build the game you want KSP 2 to be.

Best wishes and all the best for Feb. 24th!

 

By the way: I would be glad to help out testing Linux ports/builds, even if not in release quality. I got a good bit of development experience under my belt, so, feel free to contact me.

Edited February 8, 2023 by dr.phees
